title: Daikatana Playthrough -- Part 1
description: Never really looked into this game very much before, but everyone's heard of how big of a flop this game was. Really fucked up Ion Storm and John Romero. I'm playing with patch 1.3 which came out on March, 2016. So it's a very recent patch and the game runs very well now. I think it's not too bad of a game tbh, it's pretty fun. Will keep playing it.
